imdb.title: Pani poni dasshu!
imdb.plot: Rebecca Miyamoto, an 11-year-old child prodigy, accepts a teaching job at Momotsuki Gakuen (Peach Moon Academy), a high school that can be best described as 'bizarre'!

episodes.title: Summerwear in the Coldest Season, Winterwear in the Hottest
episodes.plot: The Class of 1-C is getting a new teacher after their old teacher unexpectedly quits. Rebecca Miyamoto is the replacement teacher however she is an eleven-year-old genius and is just as immature as the students she teaches.

episodes.title: A Safflower Stands Out in Any Garden
episodes.plot: Rebecca Miyamoto (Becky) may be an eleven-year-old genius however she is having trouble remembering her students names and is referring to them by nicknames she has made up for them. This upsets her students but really gets to one them named Kurumi Momose whom spirals down in to a depression after Becky refers to her as "Boring Girl".

episodes.title: Seiten o homeru ni wa nichibotsu o mate
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Yô ni kanaeba takara nari
episodes.plot: The first camping trip of the year takes a sad turn when Class 1-C's most overlooked student even overlooks herself. Salamanders and genius teachers to the rescue!

episodes.title: Yabu o tsutsuite hebi o dasu
episodes.plot: Becky's new laboratory comes with everything a genius could want - including a mysterious door! Once the lab is up and running, the students - and their problems - pay Becky a visit.

episodes.title: Kikkyô wa hito ni yorite hi ni yorazu
episodes.plot: When the smartest teacher at the academy suffers a crushing defeat at Rock, Paper, Scissors, Class 1-C gets stuck cleaning the school pool! Watch out for giant girls!

episodes.title: Kuma ni sansai koi ni goma
episodes.plot: Becky puts her brain to work when a magical girl from class comes to her in dire need of a major makeover!

episodes.title: Hassai no ogina hyakusai no warashi
episodes.plot: What's scarier than an archeological expedition filled with booby traps and horrifying creatures? An expedition with booby traps, horrifying creatures, and Becky's crazy students!

episodes.title: Naiba ni kuse ari
episodes.plot: The end of summer vacation is always a bummer, but this year it could prove deadly! Someone's placed bombs all over the school, and it's a race against the clock to disarm them!

episodes.title: Inscrutable Are the Ways of Heaven
episodes.plot: The girls of Class 1-C enlist Becky to help them solve the mystery of the green convertible - and which student might be dating the driver!

episodes.title: There Are No Classes Among Humans But There Are in Humans' Hearts
episodes.plot: Becky's troubles in dreamland are put on the backburner when an alien mind-reading device traps her students in the bizarre dream world of their sleepiest classmate!

episodes.title: The Wages of Sin Come Like the Tip of a Needle
episodes.plot: Big bad bullies threaten to destroy the academy unless Becky can defeat their fearsome boss. Looks like teach is gonna need a little help from her students - and maybe the aliens!

episodes.title: Hugging a Stone and Jumping Into an Abyss
episodes.plot: Becky's stomach comes down with a grumbling problem when the school chef goes on vacation. Guess it's time for the pint-sized genius to learn to cook - or just mooch off her students!

episodes.title: Endure Patiently and You Will Not Wilt
episodes.plot: Nothing teaches kids the importance of balance like their school bus teetering on the edge of a cliff. Nobody move until someone comes to their rescue!

episodes.title: Adversity Makes a Man Wise
episodes.plot: When the quirky class representative discovers that someone has "targeted" her, she throws herself on the mercy of the captain of the aliens!

episodes.title: The Way to Heaven Does Not Favor Anyone
episodes.plot: The school festival has finally arrived, and all the girls are excited about dressing up like maids! Becky's more accustomed to academics than fun, so she might need help loosening up!

episodes.title: Good Things Come to He Who Waits
episodes.plot: The clock is ticking when an inexperienced goddess attaches a time bomb to one of Becky's students. Class 1-C springs into action, but they only succeed in speeding up the countdown!

episodes.title: Art Causes Harm to the Body
episodes.plot: A mystery virus puts the students of Class 1-C on medical lockdown, so Becky must ask the kids of Class 1-D to help find a remedy.

episodes.title: A Wise Man Will Know Not to Approach Danger
episodes.plot: Having a mushroom attached to your body is only a problem if the mushroom is actually an alien. Especially if the alien is determined to conquer planet Earth!

episodes.title: A Demon Wearing Clothes
episodes.plot: There's a PTA meeting looming on the horizon, but Becky is nowhere to be found. Looks like Class 1-C is gonna have to find someone to impersonate the little brainiac.

episodes.title: Today a Man, Tomorrow a Mouse
episodes.plot: When the hit show "Surprise Attack! The Homeroom Next Door" makes an appearance at their school, Becky's students try to figure out why their teacher doesn't want to be caught on camera.

episodes.title: Misfortunes Never Come One by One
episodes.plot: The year is drawing to a close, and a large comet heading straight for planet Earth may be the cause of an unbelievably cold snowstorm!

episodes.title: You Are Responsible for Your Own Death
episodes.plot: In a flashback to the Edo period, one of Becky's ancestors institutes a tax against anyone caught crying. Will the taxpayers dry their eyes - or fight for justice?

episodes.title: A Time of Crisis
episodes.plot: Becky and her students set out to save Earth from the deadly comet threatening to destroy all life on the planet, but their mission will be harder than they think!

episodes.title: No One Knows What May Happen Tomorrow
episodes.plot: It's December, it's unseasonably hot, and the headmaster just cancelled afternoon classes so the students can splash around in the school's amazing waterpark!
